        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/{type}/{pi}/{logId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public DownloadJob getDownloadInfo(@PathParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                      String type,
                                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="pi")
                                                                                                                      String pi,
                                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="logId")
                                                                                                                      String logId)
                                                                                                               throws DAOException,
                                                                                                                      de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException
        Get information about a specific downloadJob
        Parameters:
        type - The jobtype, either pdf or epub
        pi - The PI of the underlying record
        logId - The logId of the underyling docStruct. Is ignored if it matches the regex [-(null)]/i
        Returns:
        A json representation of the DownloadJob
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException - if any.

 @Produces(value="application/json")
public String deleteDownloadJob(@PathParam(value="type")

                                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="pi")

                                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="logId")
                                                                                                                      String logId)
                                                                                                               throws DAOException,
                                                                                                                      de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentLibException
        Remove a download job from the database
        Parameters:
        type - The jobtype, either pdf or epub
        pi - The PI of the underlying record
        logId - The logId of the underyling docStruct. Is ignored if it matches the regex [-(null)]/i
        Returns:
        A json object containing the job identifier and wether the job could be deleted
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any.
